description: Item represents a single backup operation for a table.

^(end_position)$.description: Ending position in SQL for this backup operation.

^(source_table)$.description: The original table that was backed up.

^(start_position)$.description: Starting position in SQL for this backup operation.

^(target_table)$.description: The backup table where data was copied.

endPosition.description: Ending position in SQL for this backup operation.

sourceTable.description: The original table that was backed up.

startPosition.description: Starting position in SQL for this backup operation.

targetTable.description: The backup table where data was copied.

title: Item
